dict.acceptation: 明确地；确切地；一定地；肯定地；

sent.orig: Overall, I would definitely say that if you can business online, then definitely do it.
sent.trans: 总的说来，如果你想在网上做生意，我会明确地说，你一定要做。

sent.orig: He speaks very definitely, and I hope he acts definitely too.
sent.trans: 他说话很明确，我希望他行动也明确。

sent.orig: But it's definitely taking on some mortgage risk.
sent.trans: 但是，这无疑是在承担某些抵押贷款风险。

sent.orig: Subjectivity aside, this show definitely deserves at least a 4.
sent.trans: 客观来说，该剧至少能得4星。

sent.orig: Do you definitely want to go downhill?
sent.trans: 难道你决意要走下坡路吗？
